Traits.Name: Fire Body
Traits.Description: Has evasion and phasing. Characters they pass through are burning.

Actions.Name: Spirit Away
Actions.Description: The Hob swaps places with a character in range 2, teleporting both. If either character cannot teleport, this move cannot be made.

Actions.Name: Fortnight
Actions.Description: The Bonfire spirit creates a height 1 bonfire terrain piece. The area around and on top of the bonfire is dangerous terrain for non-Hobs and characters that end their turn on top of it take [D] piercing damage.
